name: Clones Race
description:
A FPS/racing game for the Make Something Horrible 2016 jam.

The year is 2248.

Cloning is a reality.

Humanity has exploded, The earth is saturated.

Each year, a race is organized to determine which clone lives and which clone dies...

Be the winner of the race and cheat death in this dystopian society that will make you feel unease (either that, or the horrible headbob will).
